page.title: 09Religion in Rhos
page.content: 3.The Rev.R.H.Williams is the chairman of our school,and he uses it for meetings. 4.On special occasions the Rev.R.H.Williams comes to our school and joins in the services. We went out of school and did a door to door survey.8/31 respondents less than 30 yrs. old attended church or chapel regulary.This is very few considering 14/15 respondents 50 yrs. and over went to church or chapel reguarly. As local people grow older church and chapel seems to become more popular. The older people of Rhos enjoy going to church and chapel mostly for company and a gossip about the weekly news(although they would never admit it!). Here are some names of chapels and churches in Rhos: Capel Mawr,Cyfelli,St.Davids,Sieon ,Penal,Ebinezer and St.Johns(school).
